readable.title: 3183777589_460a4f445b
readable.content: A dog sits on a red blanket with a man in a dark hoodie . A white and brown dog is laying down on a red jacket with a rodent standing on it . Big brown and white spotted dog laying on a jacket on the street . THe dog takes a rest in the park . The mouse is sitting on the dog that is in turn sitting on a coat in front of the man wearing the black top .
